languages.text: {n}Абеляр, прищурившись, долго смотрит вам в лицо, а затем тихо произносит:{/n} "Девушке, которая мне нравилась, я дарил янусские лилии, но этот сорт давно вымер... Остался лишь в моей памяти. Спросите кого другого, Ваша Светлость. Я слишком стар, чтобы помнить, как обаять девушек". {n}Насупившись, сенешаль отводит взгляд.{/n}

{n}Abelard narrows his eyes and levels you with a long look before saying quietly,{/n} "I used to give Janusian lilies to the girl I liked, but the species is long since extinct... Now it lives only in my memory. Ask someone else, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am too old to remember how to charm young ladies." {n}Frowning, the Seneschal looks away.{/n}

Остался лишь в моей памяти. Спросите кого другого, Ваша Светлость. Я слишком стар, чтобы помнить, как обаять девушек". {n}Насупившись, сенешаль отводит взгляд.{/n}

Now it lives only in my memory. Ask someone else, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am too old to remember how to charm young ladies." {n}Frowning, the Seneschal looks away.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard entrecierra los ojos y te mira durante un largo rato ante de hablar en voz baja:{/n} «Yo solía regalar lirios janusianos a la chica que me gustaba, pero hace ya mucho tiempo que se extinguieron... Ya solo perduran en mis recuerdos. Pregúntele a otro, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Soy demasiado viejo para recordar cómo se corteja a una muchacha». {n}El senescal frunce el ceño y desvía la mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and levels you with a long look before saying quietly,{/n} "I used to give Janusian lilies to the girl I liked, but the species is long since extinct... Now it lives only in my memory. Ask someone else, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am too old to remember how to charm young ladies." {n}Frowning, the Seneschal looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard entrecierra los ojos y te mira durante un largo rato ante de hablar en voz baja:{/n} «Yo solía regalar lirios janusianos a la chica que me gustaba, pero hace ya mucho tiempo que se extinguieron... Ya solo perduran en mis recuerdos. Pregúntele a otro, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Soy demasiado viejo para recordar cómo se corteja a una muchacha». {n}El senescal frunce el ceño y desvía la mirada.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは目を細め、長い間こちらを見つめてから静かに口を開く。{/n}「好意を寄せていた女性にヤヌス産のユリを渡したことがありますが、あの花はとっくに絶滅してしまいました…今は私の記憶の中でのみ咲いています。他の者にお尋ねください、陛下。乙女を口説く方法について助言するには、私は年をとりすぎています」{n}家令長は顔をしかめながら目をそらした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and levels you with a long look before saying quietly,{/n} "I used to give Janusian lilies to the girl I liked, but the species is long since extinct... Now it lives only in my memory. Ask someone else, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am too old to remember how to charm young ladies." {n}Frowning, the Seneschal looks away.{/n}

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德眯起眼睛，久久地凝视着你，随后以平静的声音开了口。{/n}“我年轻的时候曾送过加努斯百合，但这种花很多年前就灭绝了……现在，它只活在我的记忆里。大人，去问问别人吧。我年纪大了，已经不记得如何追求年轻的女士了。”{n}总领眉头紧锁，将目光移向别处。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and levels you with a long look before saying quietly,{/n} "I used to give Janusian lilies to the girl I liked, but the species is long since extinct... Now it lives only in my memory. Ask someone else, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am too old to remember how to charm young ladies." {n}Frowning, the Seneschal looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德眯起眼睛，久久地凝视着你，随后以平静的声音开了口。{/n}“我年轻的时候曾送过加努斯百合，但这种花很多年前就灭绝了……现在，它只活在我的记忆里。大人，去问问别人吧。我年纪大了，已经不记得如何追求年轻的女士了。”{n}总领眉头紧锁，将目光移向别处。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard plisse les yeux et vous observe longuement avant de répondre à voix basse :{/n} « J'offrais des lys janusiens à la femme que j'aimais, mais cette fleur a disparu depuis longtemps... Elle ne survit plus que dans ma mémoire, désormais. Interrogez quelqu'un d'autre, Votre Seigneurie. Je suis trop vieux pour me souvenir de l'art de séduire des jeunes filles. » {n}Le sénéchal fronce les sourcils et détourne le regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and levels you with a long look before saying quietly,{/n} "I used to give Janusian lilies to the girl I liked, but the species is long since extinct... Now it lives only in my memory. Ask someone else, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am too old to remember how to charm young ladies." {n}Frowning, the Seneschal looks away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard plisse les yeux et vous observe longuement avant de répondre à voix basse :{/n} « J'offrais des lys janusiens à la femme que j'aimais, mais cette fleur a disparu depuis longtemps... Elle ne survit plus que dans ma mémoire, désormais. Interrogez quelqu'un d'autre, Votre Seigneurie. Je suis trop vieux pour me souvenir de l'art de séduire des jeunes filles. » {n}Le sénéchal fronce les sourcils et détourne le regard.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard runzelt die Stirn und sieht dich lange an, ehe er leise sagt:{/n} "Ich habe meiner Angebeteten früher immer janusische Lilien geschenkt, doch die Spezies ist längst ausgestorben ... Nun lebt sie nur noch in meiner Erinnerung weiter. Fragt jemand anderen, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ich bin zu alt, um noch zu wissen, wie man junge Damen bezirzt." {n}Der Truchsess blickt stirnrunzelnd weg.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and levels you with a long look before saying quietly,{/n} "I used to give Janusian lilies to the girl I liked, but the species is long since extinct... Now it lives only in my memory. Ask someone else, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am too old to remember how to charm young ladies." {n}Frowning, the Seneschal looks away.{/n}

Ich bin zu alt, um noch zu wissen, wie man junge Damen bezirzt." {n}Der Truchsess blickt stirnrunzelnd weg.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard, gözlerini kısıp seni uzun uzadıya süzdükten sonra kısık bir sesle yanıtlıyor.{/n} "Hoşlandığım kıza Janus zambağı götürürdüm ama o türün nesli çoktan tükendi. Artık yalnızca anılarımda yaşıyor. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, iyisi mi başkasına sorun. Genç hanımların gönlünü çelmek bizden geçeli çok oluyor." {n}Seneşal, yüzünü buruşturup bakışlarını kaçırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard narrows his eyes and levels you with a long look before saying quietly,{/n} "I used to give Janusian lilies to the girl I liked, but the species is long since extinct... Now it lives only in my memory. Ask someone else, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am too old to remember how to charm young ladies." {n}Frowning, the Seneschal looks away.{/n}

Artık yalnızca anılarımda yaşıyor. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, iyisi mi başkasına sorun. Genç hanımların gönlünü çelmek bizden geçeli çok oluyor." {n}Seneşal, yüzünü buruşturup bakışlarını kaçırıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
